welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Qaanaaq, the northernmost city in Greenland! Get ready to experience the unique charm of our Inuit community and breathtaking Arctic landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our culture and natural wonders. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Qaanaaq Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Password can be obtained at the information desk.
